Primordial Rage.name: Primordial Rage
Primordial Rage.flavor: You let loose a bolt of pure primordial chaos, and it feeds off the effects of your wild magic.
Primordial Rage.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier damage. You gain an additional benefit based on the resistance currently provided by your Wild Soul.
Primordial Rage.cold: The target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Primordial Rage.fire: You push the target 1 square and knock it prone.
Primordial Rage.lightning: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Primordial Rage.thunder: Each creature adjacent to the target takes thunder damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Primordial Rage.other: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Primordial Boon.name: Primordial Boon
Primordial Boon.flavor: You exude a shield of energy that protects you from attacks.
Primordial Boon.effect: You gain resist 15 cold, resist 15 fire, resist 15 lightning, and resist 15 thunder until the end of the encounter.

Primordial Rift.name: Primordial Rift
Primordial Rift.flavor: A spout of matter from the Elemental Chaos emerges in front of you, blasting forth uncontrolled energy.
keywords: Arcane, Cold, Fire, Implement, Lightning, Thunder
Primordial Rift.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier cold, fire, lightning, and thunder damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.
Primordial Rift.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Primordial Rift.effect: Roll on the Wild Soul table. Until the end of the encounter, you gain the Wild Soul benefits of both your current Wild Soul damage type and the new type. (If you get the same result a second time, roll again.) If a later effect changes the damage type of your Wild Soul, you can choose to change either one.
